Region: I have selected multi-AZ for RDS service. RDS is very critical part of the application and having multi-AZ setup will support the application during AZ failures. I have added CloudWatch metrics and SNS service to create various alarms like CPU & Memory. It's great service from AWS to monitor our infra as well as application. Also
Service: cloudwatch alarms on the AWS billing service is a best pratice to get notified about the monthly bills.

Group hierarchy: I have included CloudWatch logs from various AWS services like VPC flowlogs
Service: CloudTrail logs etc to do log analysis. These log analysis will help me to get better understanding about all the service acitivites in the AWS account. These cloudwatch logs required to do auditing and other troubleshooing purpose.

Group hierarchy: I have included AWS WAF service as firewall to the loadbalancer. It gives additional security to the application. Also
Region: I'd enable AWS config service to do asses
Service: audit and evaluate the configurations of the aws resources.

Group hierarchy: I have included KMS service to encrypt the data stored in AWS services such as RDS. It will also help to have encrypted EBS and DB snapshots.
I'd enable AWS business support too. I understand using business support I cloud reach out to highly talented cloud support engineers for any technical and architectural advise.
